title: Statement from the Press Secretary on the Passing of Press Secretary to President Carter Jody Powell | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




September 14, 2009

 



Statement from the Press Secretary on the Passing of Press Secretary to President Carter Jody Powell




 THE WHITE HOUSE Office of the Press Secretary  ___________________________________________________________________________  For Immediate Release                                                 September 14, 2009 Statement from the Press Secretary   on the Passing of Press Secretary to President Carter Jody Powell  "I was deeply saddened to hear about the passing of Jody Powell. As Press Secretary to President Carter, Jody served his country during a difficult time, and he always did the job with grace and good humor. When I needed advice at the start of my own tenure as Press Secretary, he was always generous with his time and wise in his counsel. I’ll miss his support and encouragement, and I’ll be keeping him and his family in my thoughts and prayers."
